title: Review Call Center Efficiency
description: An operational auditor analyzes call center data to identify opportunities for improvement.

tasks.description: Obtain call center performance data for the last year, including average handle time (AHT), first call resolution (FCR), and call volume.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has the complete performance dataset.

tasks.description: Analyze the data and find that FCR has been steadily declining while AHT has been increasing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies a negative performance trend.

tasks.description: Listen to a sample of call recordings to identify the root cause, finding that new agents are struggling with a new software system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies a lack of training as the root cause.
